Class ReadWriteTextFile

java.lang.Object
  operations.ReadWriteTextFile

public class ReadWriteTextFile
extends java.lang.Object

ReadWrite is designed to write out an object to the text file designated in its constructor.

Version:
Beta 1.0 2011
Author:
Stephen Nusko
